attributes.action: Create More Affordable Housing In Order To Reduce The Number Of Homeless
attributes.additional_details:
As homelessness is increasing at a staggering rate locally and nationally, why should the homeless be deprived of a basic human right? It has been estimated that there were 2,309 rough sleepers on any one night in England. This was a rise of 31% from Autumn 2010. With homelessness projected to increase further in the next few years.

The Government should create more affordable housing, in order to create a long term solution to the increasing number of homeless.
